name: 25 Custom 1" Buttons
description: Download the TEMPLATE: JPEG Adobe Photoshop ( Right Click > "Save As" ) The template is also available on our website, badgetown.com. These buttons are a great option if you want to promote your small business, artwork, or band. These buttons are made with a professional grade button machine, so they are the highest quality buttons you can buy. You may submit up to 5 different designs per order. Just let us know how many buttons of each design you would like. Buttons are typically mailed within 3-5 business days after receipt of your final artwork. If you need your buttons by a certain date, please contact us first by e-mail (info@badgetown.com) to be sure they will arrive in time. GRAPHIC REQUIREMENTS: - Up to 5 graphic files placed on the template - 300 dpi, RGB color profile - File types: JPG, PNG, TIF or PSD - Please keep your text large. Smaller fonts are often illegible. - You MUST have permission to use any artwork submitted for buttons If you have any questions about the artwork requirements, please don't hesitate to contact us. Graphics are printed with a high resolution digital printer at 300dpi so your graphics will come out very crisp, often better than offset printing. Solid color and graphic images and illustrations tend to work better than photographs, but photographs are certainly acceptable. If there appear to be any quality issues with your buttons, we will contact you immediately.
